original_prompt: Determine whether the two given sentences clearly agree with each other (entailment), disagree with each other (contradiction), or if this cannot be determined (neutral). Answer must be the letters E, C, and N, respectively.
generated_prompts: Determine whether the two given sentences clearly agree with each other (entailment), disagree with each other (contradiction), or if this cannot be determined (neutral). Answer must be the letters E, C, and N, respectively. C: If one sentence contradicts the other sentence.  E: If one sentence agrees with the other sentence.  N: If we can not determine whether the two sentences contradict each other or agree with each other.
